SEARCH
Package uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop

Class BackgroundCell

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.Cell
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.BackgroundCell
public class BackgroundCell extends Cell
A background cell represents scenery or landscape in the railway simulation. Background cells are non-track cells that provide visual decoration to the game world.

This class extends the abstract Cell class to represent background scenery. Examples include grass, water, forests, buildings, and dirt areas.

Inheritance Hierarchy:

  • Cell (abstract base class for all grid cells)
  • └── BackgroundCell (represents non-track scenery)

Example Usage:

 Position pos = new Position(5, 10);
 BufferedImage grassImage = ImageUtil.loadImage("grass.png", Color.GREEN, "G");
 BackgroundCell grass = new BackgroundCell(pos, BackgroundType.GRASS, grassImage);
See Also:

  • TrackCell

      position - the grid position of this background cell
